name: (6) As used in this section, "service dog" shall have the same meaning as in section . [L 2002, c 259, pt of 1; am L 2011, c 175, 10; am L 2013, c 205, 3] (2) Animal hoarding is a misdemeanor. [L 2008, c 128, 1, 7; am L 2009, c 160, 2, 3] (2) As used in this section: "Bait dog" means a live animal used to train or prepare dogs for a dogfight. "Device" means both animate and inanimate objects and includes live animals used as bait dogs. "Wager" means staking or risking something of value on the outcome of a dogfight. (3) As used in this section: (4) Cruelty to animals by trapping is a misdemeanor. [L 2013, c 208, 3]
